description: If you like cream biscuits you'll love these. The perfect treat for afternoon tea.
name: Jam and Cream Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy add vanilla and the egg, beat well.
Add sifted dry ingredients and coconut, mix well.
Roll teaspoons of mixture into balls. Put on lightly greased oven trays. Gently press down with fork to rough up surfaces of biscuits.
Bake at 180 degrees celsius for 10-15 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and cool on wire rack.
Make icing by creaming the remaining butter, icing sugar, milk and vanilla essence.
Put a teaspoon of the jam and a teaspoon of the icing on a biscuit and top with another one. Press together lightly.
